publisher.value: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

description.value: Reasons that a value associated with a test or other observation is missing.

display.value: The source was asked but declined to respond to the question, or the question was left unanswered.
The question or data element is not applicable, or based on other answers, no answer to this question is required.
The reason the information is not present is not known.
The request or order to collect this information was cancelled.
Missing due to a problem collecting, identifying, or locating the specimen, including patient refusal or unable to provide specimen
Missing due to a problem with the specimen, e.g. contamination, clotting, improper tube type, improper storage, too small, etc.
